summary: Processes IP‑Adapter mask images by optionally resizing them to VAE‑compatible dimensions, applying a chosen resampling filter, converting to grayscale, normalizing pixel values, and binarizing the result, preparing masks for model consumption.
business_intent: Ensures mask inputs are correctly sized, formatted, and scaled so they can be seamlessly integrated into diffusion or other generative pipelines that rely on IP‑Adapter components.
